fields.name: Oh that? It means you should probably buy the game instead of pirate it. o:
Abilities:
fields.value: - Target a player each night to give them a peculiar message.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Every player you visit will receive a nonsensical message. The host may make up a list of nonsensical messages to send, but one of them must be *"What is the square root of a fish? Now I'm sad."*
- If any player you have visited mentions this message, they will be instantly modkilled for being a filthy pirate.
- You may not target yourself.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Live to see at least one person modkilled because of you.
